snippet: In New York, developers and retailers on Roosevelt Island plan to get more residents to shop closer to home by adding shops to its Main Street corridor.
abstract: New York developers and retailers on Roosevelt Island plan to get more residents to shop closer to home by adding storefronts to its Main Street corridor.
lead_paragraph: In New York, developers and retailers on Roosevelt Island plan to get more residents to shop closer to home by adding shops to its Main Street corridor.

headline.seo: Roosevelt Island to Upgrade Shopping Strip
headline.main: New Lures Promised for Shoppers on an Urban Island
headline.print_headline: New Lures Promised for Shoppers on an Urban Island
